display_long_description:
# October 2024 Update 3.1

Get ready for a spooky experience! This October, we're adding a brand-new set of puzzles featuring Halloween and horror-themed designs to celebrate the season. Along with these chilling new puzzles, we’ve made additional improvements to enhance gameplay. Dive into haunting environments, solve eerie puzzles, and enjoy a more immersive, festive experience!

# September 2024 Update 3.0

After listening to your feedback, we have implemented various gameplay improvements, added new puzzles, and enhanced performance for a smoother experience.

Stay tuned because more updates are on the way!

# Oasis Puzzles

Explore the enchanting world of Oasis puzzles, a game that provides a soothing and visually delightful experience. With a collection of intricately detailed puzzles, each is an artwork that immerses you in a realm of tranquility and beauty.

# Play with Your Hands!

Experience a more natural and intuitive way to solve puzzles with our new hand tracking feature. Now, you can interact directly with the puzzles using your hands, without the need for controllers. This cutting-edge technology allows you to fully immerse yourself in the game, providing a more realistic and engaging experience.

Oasis Puzzles is an AR version of the original game: Oasis Puzzles, with AR being the main difference. It will receive exclusive features soon.
